display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 129px; height: 1px; padding-top: 80px; margin-left: 150px;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;
div.font:
ClusterIP rewriting
policy: Cluster means
random pod-ip, may hop to
another node = src ip rewriting
(SNAT = stateful conntrack)

a.text: Viewer does not support full SVG 1.1
